article_title: New Report From Forbes Insights And Sun Life Financial Casts Fresh Light On Impact Of Affordable Care Act On Employers

article_metadata.description: NEW YORK (November 14, 2013) — A new report casts a fresh light on how the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (ACA) is affecting the employers who provide 197 million Americans with their health insurance. The report, "A Comet Hits Planet Health Care: How the Affordable Care Act Changes an [...]
